question:
Recently, the Central Council for Research in Unani Medicine (CCRUM) organised a two-day international conference on Unani Medicine on the occasion of Unani Day. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Unani Day is celebrated on the birth anniversary of Hakim Muhammad Sharif Khan
  2. The Unani System of Medicine originated in Greece
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because the Unani Day is celebrated on 11th February marking the birth anniversary of Hakim Ajmal Khan, a famous physician in Delhi and one of the founders of Jamia Millia Islamia University. He was born on 11 Feb 1868. Recently, the CCRUM celebrated his 150<sup>th</sup> birth anniversary. <u>Second statement is correct</u> because the Unani System of Medicine originated in Yunan- ancient Greece. In India, it came from Arab and Iran.
